message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I think it would be a valuable addition for you.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10,000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me. Could you do $13,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. Would $12,000 be acceptable?
